Apple å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£ï¼š

This method removes the provided view from the stackâ€™s arrangedSubviews array. The viewâ€™s position and size will no longer be managed by the stack view. However, this method does not remove the provided view from the stackâ€™s subviews array; therefore, the view is still displayed as part of the view hierarchy.
To prevent the view from appearing on screen after calling the stackâ€™s removeArrangedSubview: method, explicitly remove the view from the subviews array by calling the viewâ€™s removeFromSuperview() method, or set the viewâ€™s isHidden property to true.
